Text: Game loads, but doesn't start missions, or campaign.  Maybe a missing file, or bad crack.  Anyone have any luck with this?
don't block it with your firewall and it loads fine.
scanned it with avast no virus at all i've also played it for a couple of hours no problem with my pc
After following the above instructions about not blocking with firewall I found it does work, and is a really fun game for those that liked Jane Fleet Commander..  Props to the uploader..
